      • canApplyToAllLanguages

        public static boolean canApplyToAllLanguages(Contentlet cc)
        Return if the content can be use as a default to all languages. It is a conjuntion of canDefaultContentToDefaultLanguage(), wherever it is a form widget and canDefaultWidgetToDefaultLanguage() if the content is a widget. This method is intended to keep this rules in one place so it can be used by DotResourceLoader and content service cache invalidator. Also the contentlet must live in the default language.
        Parameters:
        cc -
        Returns:
